backend/main.mo: Defines the main canister with access control, user approval, profile management, and idempotent approval request reset logic using Maps and MixinAuthorization.
backend/migration.mo: Provides a trivial migration that preserves the requestCounter field across upgrades.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report structure with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing human-written summaries of all frontend source files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers and OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes with Android-inspired theming.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component that manages identity and approval state to route users to login, pending, or main app views.
frontend/src/components/AdminGuard.tsx: Protects admin-only routes by redirecting non-admin users and showing a loading state while verifying access.
frontend/src/hooks/useAccessStatus.ts: Query hook that fetches approval and admin status for the current identity with refetching on mount and focus.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches the backend actor based on the current identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements the Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, stored identity loading, and logout.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for profiles, approval requests, admin approval management, and roles with automatic invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining light and dark theme CSS variables and base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AccessPendingScreen.t: UI for submitting and tracking access approval requests with localStorage persistence and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin interface for viewing, approving, rejecting users, and managing roles and announcements.
frontend/src/pages/HomeScreen.tsx: Home dashboard showing user profile, announcements, module navigation, and admin access.
frontend/src/pages/LoginScreen.tsx: Login screen allowing users to authenticate via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/pages/modules/FrieslandFung: Placeholder module page with header, navigation back, and informational content.
frontend/src/pages/modules/LandVanOns.ts: Placeholder module page for Land van Ons with navigation and basic layout.
frontend/src/pages/modules/Pottle.tsx: Placeholder module page for Pottle featuring header, navigation, and placeholder text.
frontend/src/router/AppRouter.tsx: Sets up the root TanStack router with routes for home, module pages, and an admin route protected by AdminGuard.
Manages storing, retrieving, and clearing a user's pending access request in localStorage with principal validation.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from URL/hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, plugins, colors, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing app purpose, architecture notes, known issues, and existing feature definitions.
